review_data.title: KEIN zweiter Versuch wert ‼️
review_data.content: Meine Freundin & ich haben gestern dort den Afternoon Tea „genossen“.... 1. Herzige, winzige Lokalität mit 3 Tischchen. 2. Sehr...More

review_data.title: Cupcake 🌟KÖSTLICH
review_data.content: Exzellente Cupcakes !!!!!! ein kleiner charmanter Laden und eine extrem freundliche Chefin aus London.

review_data.title: A rare source of scones in Zurich
review_data.content: I have bought cupcakes and scones here a couple of times. It is a beautiful small shop and a treat to walk into. Scones are hard to come by in Zurich and they are served with clotted cream and a delicious jam.

review_data.title: Afternoon Tea mit leichten Abstrichen
review_data.content: Das Flourpower ist ein wirklich sehr kleines Café in Seefeld, Zürich. Wir wurden freundlich begrüsst und durften an zwei Tischen...More

review_data.title: Feine Kuchenspezialitäten.
review_data.content: Feine Kuchenspezialitäten im Seefeld. Super Ambiente, nette Geschäftsinhaberin. Cupcakes ist absolut zu emfehlen, best of Seefeld.

review_data.title: Lovely English tea shop
review_data.content: This is a lovely English tea shop, just 2 minutes walk from the lake if you're taking a stroll. The cup cakes are delicious as are the scones with cream and jam. You can book a tea party or just pop in to buy some...More

review_data.title: Great cupcakes, lovely owner
review_data.content: I stopped in at FlourPower Cupcakes as I needed a cure for my sweet tooth fix. They are located in the Seefeld neighborhood and easily accessed with public transit Tram #2, #4 or several buses. This small shop has a couple of tables and is...More

review_data.title: Excellent Afternoon Tea...at last
review_data.content: Tiny little tea house with wickedly delicious cupcakes, decorated within an inch of their lives. Mala, the attractive owner also makes a yumm scone tea, but ring to tell her you want this as they may be all gone by the time you arrive. As...More

review_data.title: It is a lovely place
review_data.content: Charming and friendly... It was a neat english afternoon tea. But to be absolutely honest, portions could be a bit bigger for the price.

review_data.title: Lovely place full of charm
review_data.content: What a gem of a place tucked away in a trendy area of Zurich. Nice to know that at last someone is addressing the lack of tea houses here.

review_data.title: Super !
review_data.content: Le salon de the m a ete conseille par une amie - endroit extra pour passer un excellent moment -...More

review_data.title: Cupcakes paradise
review_data.content: I found this tiny and lovely shop, just by chance, one afternoon, on my way towards the lake. After spending at least ten minutes watching the windows, full of vintage and fancy objects (on sale!), then I decided it was worth to pay a visit...More

review_data.title: Quaint English Tea Room in the heart of Zurich
review_data.content: If you are looking for a selection of tastefull sandwiches, freshly baked scones with jam and cream, delicious cupcakes or even a bespoke & personalised birthday cakes, Flowerpower Cupcakes is the place for your to visit. With the warm & friendly welcome you will be...More

review_data.title: Best English tea in the world ?
review_data.content: It would seem paradoxical to come to Zurich for an English afternoon tea but this restaurant certainly serves a better "classic" afternoon tea than you would find in most British cities. The place is small , chic and tucked away in Kreis 8. The sand...More

review_data.title: Best high tea
review_data.content: The best high tea n cupcakes in town. Tasty n soft cup cakes with different flavor unlike the other cup cake shop who sale expensive but dry cupcakes in Zurich. Must try it out

review_data.title: A secret treasure trove of homemade cupcakes
review_data.content: Flourpower tastefully toes the line of pretty meets modern, with its delicate bright interior and delicious selection of impossibly cute cupcakes. If, like me, you are a Brit away from home, the authentic afternoon tea offers an escape from the cosmopolitan life of Zurich and...More

review_data.title: Absolutely gorgeous tea room
review_data.content: A couple of my friends and I booked afternoon tea trying out different places in Zurich. Our host Malar served us traditional tea with a selection of sandwiches and scones with clotted cream along with mini cupcakes all made by hand and to the best...More

review_data.title: Amazing Cakes and afternoon Tea
review_data.content: I have visited Flour Power Cupcakes many times and am never disappointed. The afternoon tea is delicious, Malar, the owner, makes her own scones which are light and fluffy and the cupcakes are equally as delicious, coming in an exciting range of flavours, there is...More

review_data.title: The very best cupcakes ever
review_data.content: This small cupcake store with the best tea and a lovely lady who is serving the best cupcakes with love.

review_data.title: Voted "The Best Cupcake" in Switzerland
review_data.content: Flourpower Cupcake is the best place to go for cupcakes and afternoon tea. The shop and team room is located in the chic Seefeld area near Zurich lake and the Opera House, nestled in the neighborhood. a place full of charm and intimacy. The cupcakes...More

review_data.title: The best english afternoon tea in the world?
review_data.content: It makes little sense to come to Zurich to get a perfect english afternoon tea but this is just what you should do. Flour power is a tiny tea room . Everything in the shop is for sale including the art work and the crockery....More
